00122 
00135 MTKt_status MtkOrbitToPath(
00136   int orbit, 
00137   int *path   )
00138 {
00139   MTKt_status status_code;  /* Return status of this function */
00140   int first_path_num = 177; /* path number counted as first for 
00141                                purposes of converting orbit to path */
00142 
00143   if (path == NULL)
00144     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_NULLPTR);
00145 
00146   if (orbit < 4)
00147     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_OUTBOUNDS);
00148 
00149   if (orbit < 1000)
00150     if (orbit_path[orbit] == 0)
00151       return MTK_FAILURE;
00152     else
00153       *path = orbit_path[orbit];
00154   else
00155     *path = (first_path_num - 1 + orbit * 16) % 233 + 1;
00156 
00157   return MTK_SUCCESS;
00158 
00159 ERROR_HANDLE:
00160   return status_code;
00161 }
